alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 7:32PM CDT until June 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Clarendon affecting Arkansas and Monroe Counties. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 06... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Des Arc. * WHEN...Until Monday, June 06. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Many acres of farmland flooded within the levees. Water is backing up Bayou Des Arc and Cypress Bayou. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 24.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain steady above 24.0 feet through the forecast period, then fall below flood stage Sunday, June 05. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date White River Des Arc 24.0 24.6 Thu 7 PM 24.6 24.5 24.4 **STEADY** &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
